explanations.machine learning: The paper compares the performance of the proposed PSO-GRU model with other machine learning models, indicating the use of machine learning techniques.
explanations.deep learning: The paper focuses on forecasting realized volatility using an optimized deep learning model, specifically mentioning the GRU model.
explanations.neural network: The GRU model is a type of recurrent neural network, which is a subset of neural networks.
explanations.recurrent neural network: The GRU (Gated Recurrent Unit) model is a type of recurrent neural network used in the study.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper compares the performance of the PSO-GRU model with the LSTM (Long Short-Term Memory) model.
explanations.LSTM: The paper explicitly mentions the LSTM model as one of the models compared against the proposed PSO-GRU model.
explanations.feature learning: The paper discusses feature selection methods, which are related to feature learning in the context of machine learning.
explanations.representation learning: The use of deep learning models like GRU involves representation learning to capture patterns in the data.
